pages.text: How the fabled Illager's totem is made was a mystery to many magic users until now...$(br2)You can recreate a Totem of Undying yourself by constructing the base totem (or find one hidden in ruined structures) and powering it on an Altar of Souls.

pages.title: Unpowered Totem
pages.text: In case you forgot how it works, the totem will provide you with an extra life should you die, as long as you are holding it in one of your hands.
